message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great opportunity to buy a fantastic product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to make a counteroffer of $100 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $135. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $120 for the product.
